statements: DELETE FROM vehicle_maintenance WHERE vehicle_id = 100 AND service_date = '2022-01-15';
DELETE FROM vehicle_maintenance WHERE cost > 500 AND service_type = 'Major Repair';
DELETE FROM parts_replaced WHERE part_name = 'Brake Pads';
DELETE FROM parts_replaced WHERE part_cost > 100 AND service_id IN (SELECT service_id FROM services WHERE cost > 500);
DELETE FROM services WHERE service_id = 100 AND service_type = 'Maintenance';
DELETE FROM parts_replaced WHERE part_id = 200 AND part_cost > 500 AND part_name = 'Engine Piston';
DELETE FROM PartsReplaced WHERE part_cost > 1000 OR replacement_date < '2022-01-01';
